Plot: The mad journey of a rebellious princess who ventures to work at a brothel to find the tattooed intruder she met on a fateful night.
Title: Princess Sakura: Forbidden Pleasures
Writer: Nanboku Tsuruya (original story), Masahiro Yoshimoto (screenplay), Hajime Hashimoto (screenplay)
Actors: Munetaka Aoki, Yuma Asami, Denden, Masashi Goda
